Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScheduleSystem.EventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A use case class that manages the events.

      • signUpUser

        public boolean signUpUser(User user,
                          Event event)
                   throws AlreadySignedUpException,
                          TimeConflictException
        Sign a user up for an event
        Parameters:
        user - the user to sign up
        event - the event to sign the user up
        Returns:
        true iff the event is successfully signed up for the user.
        Throws:
        AlreadySignedUpException - if the user has already signed up for the event
        TimeConflictException - if the user has signed up for another event at the same time period.

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser(User user,
                          Event event)
                   throws UnableToCancelException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Removes a user from the event.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be removed.
        event - the event to remove from.
        Returns:
        true iff the event has been successfully removed the user.
        Throws:
        UnableToCancelException - when the user did not sign up for the event.
        java.io.IOException

        Returns:

      • getAvailableEventsForUser

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getAvailableEventsForUser(User user)
        Returns all the events available for this user. The events must not be full and the user must not have signed this event up before.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to search for.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of events this user can choose to sign up.

        event - the event to check.
        Returns:

      • userAvailableForEvent

        public boolean userAvailableForEvent(User user,
                                     Event event)
        Checks if a user is available for a certain event, aka no time conflict.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to check.
        event - the event to check.
        Returns:
        true iff the user is available to participate in the event.
